resources.string: Death Stranding requires a Radeon RX Vega 56 8GB graphics card with a Core i7-6700K 4-Core 4.0GHz or Ryzen R5 1600 processor to reach the recommended specs, achieving high graphics setting on 1080p. Minimum RAM requirements are 8 GB system memory. Your graphics card will need to be capable of running DirectX 11. In short you need a 3 year old PC for best Death Stranding performance.
